1.0.name: wordpress/brainsmatch
1.0.description: BrainsMatch WordPress plugin is creating a list of Soulmates and Oponnents for the current user based on posts and comments rating. Blog reader is pressing one of the "Agree" or "Disagree" buttons located under each post or comment and can see other users who have similar or polar views listed in the widget box. The users are calculated across all the blogs where the plugin is installed. The plugin is based on BrainsMatch innovative real-time collaborative filter (patent pending). More information about BrainsMatch Engine and API can be found in the API section of BrainsMatch Technology Blog.
